change.item: Did initial tagging, added header. Also added some strophes from Maehler that Jebb doesn't have. Ode 1, 1st 5 strophes. Ode 12, last 2 strophes.
Removed capital letters, filled in speaker tages in ode 18.
Added most of Ode 14b, which is missing in Jebb, and which the Svarlien translation has. Edited the notes so they were full sentences.

$Log: bacchyl_gk.xml,v $ Revision 1.1 2009-10-08 19:13:29 rsingh04 began reorganizing texts module by collection. created separate work directory in texts module to keep hopper files separate from in progress files
Revision 1.4 2009/05/27 15:55:16 rsingh04 added cvs log keyword

div2.note: 2 lines missing at the end of ant. 1, 2 at the beginning of ep. 1.
Str., ant. and epode 3 are extremely fragmentary.
6 lines at the end of ant. 3 and all of epode 3 are lost.
div2.l: qh=ken a)nt' eu)ergesia=n, liparw=n t' a)/l-
tos de\ kai\ deiloi=sin a)nqrw/pwn o(milei=,
dro/s: o( d' eu)= e)/rdwn qeou\s
o(/sson a)\n zw/h| la/xe to/nde xro/non ti-
kalw=n d' a)ne/mnasen, o(/s' e)n kleennw=|
la/mpei d' u(po\ marmarugai=s o( xruso\s
nah/sat', e)/nqa su\[n a)lo/xw|] te kedna=|
ta\ pro/sqe d' e)xqra\ fi/la: qanei=n glu/kiston.
parqe/noi, fi/las t' a)na\ matri\ xei=ras
a)/piston ou)de/n, o(/ ti q[ew=n me/]rimna
dolo/]essa d' e)lpi\s u(p[o\ ke/ar de/duken
o(/sia drw=n eu)/fraine qumo/n: tou=to ga\r
ou) sa/petai: eu)frosu/na d' o( xruso/s:
a)ndri\ d' ou) qe/mis, polio\n p[ar]e/nta
h(/ban. a)reta=[s ge m]e\n ou) minu/qei
tri/ton ga\r par' o)mfa]lo\n u(yidei/rou xqono\s
e)/ti de\ te/]traton ei)/ tis or-
ou)/ nin korufai\ mega/las i)/sxousi gai/as,
tw\s nu=n kai\ e)moi\ muri/a pa/nta| ke/leuqos
xoi pai=des: eu)= e)/rdwn de\ mh\ ka/moi qeo/s.
to\n d' w(s i)/den *)alkmh/nios qaumasto\s h(/rws
ptu/cas fare/tras pw=ma: tw=| d' e)nanti/a
sta=qi/ t' e)n xw/ra|, gelanw/sas te qumo/n
ou)/toi de/os. w(\s fa/to: qa/mbhsen d' a)/nac
ti/s d' e)/ktanen ; h)= ta/xa kalli/zwnos *(/hra
e)/sxen xo/lon: eu)rubi/an d' e)/sseue kou/ra
e(\c a)/mata sunexe/ws: e)pei\ de\ dai/mwn
e)sqlo/n t' *)afa/rhta, qoou\s ma/trwas: ou) ga\r
zwa=s o(/ron a(mete/ras e)/mmen. tu/xon me\n
ai)ai=: pu/maton de\ pne/wn da/krusa tl[a/mwn
toi=' e)/fa: qnatoi=si mh\ fu=nai fe/riston,
fe/ggos: a)ll' ou) ga/r ti/s e)stin
xrh\ kei=no le/gein o(/,ti kai\ me/llei telei=n.
ta/n ken lipara\n e)qe/lwn qei/man a)/koitin.
eu)kle/a keleu/qou glw=ssan ou)[k e)kto\s di/kas
w(=| de\ su\ presbu/taton nei/mh|s ge/ras

div2.note: The text of str. 1 is fragmentary.
div2.l: qeodo/tous eu)xa/s, peri\ k[rati/ t' o)/]pa[ssa]s
ai)qe/r' e)k xeiro\s boa\n w)/trune law=n,
sa\n *ne]me/a| ni/kan: to/ [ge/] toi kalo\n e)/rgon
e)/sta[: bre/xw]v? d' a)=|c' au)=te qath/rwn e)lai/w|
a)mfi/ t' *eu)/boian pol[ula/i+o]n, oi(/ q' i(era\n
teu/cetai. muri/ai d' a)ndrw=n e)pista=mai pe/lontai:
h)\ ga\r sofo\s h)\ *xari/twn tima=n lelogxw\s
oi( d' e)p' e)/rgoisi/n te kai\ a)mfi\ bow=n a)ge/lais
pa=| tu/xa bri/sei. to\ me\n ka/lliston, e)sqlo\n
a)/ndra pollw=n u(p' a)nqrw/pwn poluzh/lwton ei)=men:
xrhsto/n. ti/ makra\n glw=ssan i)qu/sas e)lau/nw
kw=moi/ te kai\ eu)frosu/nai qeo/timon a)/stu:
kei/nw| ge su\n a)/mati pro\s gai/a| peso/nta.
portitro/f[on a)\n pedi/on pa/t]ran q' i(ke/sqai.
kti/zein, pri\n e)s a)rgale/an pesei=n a)na/gkan:
to\n d' ei(=len a)/xos kradi/an, cei/-
tai\ d' au)ti/ka voi te/menos bwmo/n te teu=xon,
ei) dh/ pote kai\ pa/ros: e)s ga\r o)lbi/an

div2.note: ant. 1, ep. 1, and the first ten verses of str. b, are lost.
div2.l: fai/nwn: to/ ge so\[n kle/os ai)]nei=
ni/kan t' e)rikude/a me/lpet', w)= ne/oi,
ta\n e)p' *)alfeiou= te r(oai=s qama\ dh\
div2.note: The last v. of str. 7, and the first nine of ant. 7 are lost.

div2.l: eu)= me\n ei(ma/rqai para\ dai/[monos a)n-
muri/]ai d' a)ndrw=n a)retai/, mi/a d' e)[k
listos: eu)= e)/rdonta de\ kai\ qeo\s o)[rqoi=.
div2.note: The rest of the text is lost.>
The rest of the ode is lost.

div2.l: a( d' ai)o/lois ke/rdessi kai\ a)frosu/nais
a)= du/smoros, a)= ta/lain', oi(=on e)mh/sato:
o(/ ti me\n e)k qew=n moi=ra pagkrath\s
xe mh=tin. ei) kai/ se kedna\
e)ru/ken u(/brin: ou) ga\r a)\n qeloi-
dei/comen: ta\ d' e)pio/nta dai/mwn krinei=.
dikw\n qra/sei sw=ma patro\s e)s do/mous.
ei)/seai d' ai)/ k' e)ma=s klu/h|
dw=ra: su\ d' o)/rnu' e)s ba-
w(\s ei)=pe: tw=| d' ou) pa/lin
na=a: moi=ra d' e(te/ran e)po/rsun' o(do/n.
pe d' a)mfi\ gui/ois qew=n dw=r', a)glao/-
klagen de\ po/ntos: h)i/+qeoi d' e)ggu/qen

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: fqe/ggeu: doke/w ga\r ei)/ tini brotw=n

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ti/na d' e)/mmen po/qen a)/ndra tou=ton
w(=de kai\ qrasu/n, o(/s te tou/twn
pa/nt' e)n tw=| dolixw=| xro/nw| telei=tai.

sp.speaker: *ai)geu/s
sp.l: cestou\s de\ du/' e)n xe/ress' a)/kontas
